title: PROJECT skins next?

embed.description: COMPLETE version of my fan-made VFX for PROJECT/PROGRAM: Karthus. Whatever you want. All feedback is greatly welcome! :) I'll probably take a short break after this one. Got a lot to do. See you later. :D Interactive Player: http://www.sirhaian.net/portfolio/LeagueOfEffects (Doesn't work in Chrome, sorry guys) Music from Riot Games.

body:
Since we got Pajama star guardian thing this patch, I hope soon we will see another PROJECT skin trio, it's been too long.
Something like this PROJECT: Karthus would be so sick.

replies.body: "Due to the success of Pajama Guardians, we're introducing PROJECT: Pajamas skins for Yasuo, Yi, Zed, and Leona!"

Its cool and all but they don't give mages/casters Project. He would get Program or Battlecast long before Project was ever considered. Those would be cool on him. I'd personally like to see Cosmic Karthus, cause' he'd make a giant galaxy nebula around him!
winter twitch mundo and soraka were leeked...
Projects, star guardian and arcade were skipped for 2018 to bring out other themes. Next patch we should be seeing a winter theme.
